channel.title: Shop edit prob
channel.description:
I followed "adding shops tut made easy" and I compiled my work and this came up when running server...how do i fix..I worked in autospawn.cfg and shops.cfg and then added to wanne shops in client .java..here are some pics
[URL=http://imageshack.us][IMG]http://img299.imageshack.us/img299/1637/serverprobvw3.png[/img][/URL]

item.title: Shop edit prob
item.dc:creator: @M00_M00_Pk M00 M00 Pk
item.description:
@M00_M00_Pk wrote:

When you were adding the NPC into autospawn.cfg, did you use spaces or tab in between the gaps
EG

[NPC] [NUMBER] [NUMBER]
And so on, in the gaps you pressed space or tab? Becuase you need to use tab.
Your wanneShops are fine, as far as i know, but im thinking the TAB Thing is what is causing the error.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: January 13, 2008, 01:13:02 PM[/size][hr]You beat me to it :o -.-

Read full topic

item.title: Shop edit prob
item.dc:creator: @Waffles1 Waffles!!
item.description:
@Waffles1 wrote:

I only have to look at the first picture
In autospawn and shop.cfg, there must be a between each number.
shop = 1 1 1
You have
shop = 1 1 1
Those being examples.

Read full topic
